scripts.test: cross-env NODE_END=test && npx sequelize db:migrate:undo:all --env test && npx sequelize db:migrate --env test && jest
scripts.tstmigrations: cross-env NODE_END=test && npx sequelize db:migrate:undo:all --env test && npx sequelize db:migrate --env test
scripts.devmigrations: cross-env NODE_END=test && npx sequelize db:migrate:undo:all --env development && npx sequelize db:migrate --env development
